collection_holder_name: Business & Media Archives of the Mahoning Valley
pageContext.collection_description: Series of audio cassette tapes recorded by Milton Greenberg as host of a WYSU radio program. There are a total of 309 tapes housed in 9 three drawer cassette drawers. From the years 1989, 90, 91, 92, 93, 94, 95, 96, 97. This was from an interview style program and has interview with local and national artists.
